title: How to get a girl in Marseille - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1 : Wear the most expensive designer clothes you can find Step 2 : Go to a nightclub such as Le bazzard, Le trolley, Le Rooftop… Step 3 : Pick up girls’ instagrams and talk to them a few days after I feel like girls in Marseille are either extremely easy or extremely hard to get, but there is a lot of pretty girls out there…
